attributes.action: Urgent Concerns - EU Entry/Exit System (EES) and its Impact on UK HGV Drivers
attributes.additional_details: I urge you to raise this issue with the relevant government departments in the EU and to advocate for a visa-free or exempted travel arrangement for UK professional drivers. Our work is essential for the UK . To avoid putting UK Companies and drivers out of business.   While EES may seem like a minor administrative change on the surface, its impact on professional drivers like me will be profound due to the "90/180-day rule."
attributes.background: International HGV drivers to express my grave concerns about the implementation of the European Union's new Entry/Exit System (EES), scheduled to come into force on the 12th October 2025.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/738267
